data.title: Chronology of Postage Stamps (1890
data.text:
1891

February

North Borneo joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

April

First postage stamps for British Central Africa are issued, using stamps of Rhodesia overprinted "B.C.A.". [700.1126] [1135]

(month unknown)

Kabul (Afghanistan) issues its last postage stamps. [700.254]

Afghanistan issues its first postage stamps. [700.254]

vvv advertisement vvv

^^^ advertisement ^^^

Negri Sembilan issues its first postage stamps. [1367.699]

Sungei Ujong issues its first postage stamps. [1367.705]

France issues first postage stamps for use in French Congo, using overprints of French Colonies stamps. [1843.1292]

August

Malay state Negri Sembilan issues its first postage stamps, using overprinted stamps of Straits Settlements, denomination 2 cents. [1135]

October 1

Additions to the Universal Postal Union: New South Wales, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Victoria, and Western Australia. [1135]

1892

January 2

British South Africa Company issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

February 1

France issues first postage stamps for use in Obock, using overprints of French Colonies. [1135] [1367.1559]

February

Nandgaon State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.941]

Indian feudatory state Nandgaon issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

April 1

Funchal district of Port Madeira issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

Indian feidatory state of Cochin issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

April 19

Cook Islands issues its first postage stamps. [707.527] [1135]

June

In Paris, France, Hector Geroux murders Gaston Leroux in his apartment, then steals his Hawaii 2-cent 1851/52 postage stamp. (The theft is soon discovered, Geroux confesses, is found guilty and is executed.) [1793.14]

(month unknown)

The first postage stamps of Angra (of Azores) are issued. [700.412]

First postage stamps for Benin under French control are issued, using overprinted stamps of French Colonies. [700.908]

Johore issues its own first postage stamps. [1367.695]

Panang issues its own first postage stamps. [1367.700]

Perak issues its own first postage stamps. [1367.702]

Selangor issues its own first postage stamps. [1367.702]

Swaziland issues last postage stamps (resumed in 1933). [285.255]

First postage stamps are issued for Horta, depicting King Carlos of Portugal. [1841.728]

France issues non-overprint postage stamps for use in Indo-China. [1841.947]

Cochin State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.932]

France issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in Saint Pierre and Miquelon. [278.818]

France issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in Senegal. [278.1046]

Portugal issues first postage stamps for use in Ponta Delgada. [278.393]

France issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in Obock. [1367.1559]

France issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in Martinique. [1367.846]

France issues first postage stamps for use in Mayotte. [1367.882]

France issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in French Congo. [1843.1292]

Portugal issues first postage stamps for use in Funchal. [1843.1359]

Italy issues first postage stamps for use in the colony of Eritrea, using overprints of Italy. [1843.1035]

France issues first postage stamps for use in French Guinea. [1843.1299]

France issues first postage stamps for use in French Oceania. [1843.1310]

France issues first postage stamps for use in French India. [1843.1300]

July 2

British New Guinea joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

July 20

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in the Oil Rivers Protectorate, overprints of United Kingdom stamps. [1135] [1367.1481]

November

French Oceanic Settlements issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

Anjouan issues its first postage stamps. [700.425] [1135]

French India issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

Ivory Coast issues its first postage stamps. [1135] [1841.1256]

French Guinea issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

1893

June 1

Belgium issues postage stamps with attached labels indicating no delivery on Sunday. If the label is removed, delivery on Sunday will be done if necessary. [1135]

(month unknown)

First postage stamps for German East Africa are issued, overprints of German stamps. [1841.83]

Bamra State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.927]

Duttia State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.934]

Nowanuggur State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.941]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in the Niger Coast Protectorate, depicting Queen Victoria. [1367.1482]

December 31

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Poonch State of India. [1841.942]

1894

April 12

France issues first postage stamps for use in French Sudan, using overprints of French Colonies. [1135] [1843.1355]

April

Saint Marie de Madagascar issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

May

Indian feudatory state Bundi issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

June 1

Kewkiang China issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

(month unknown)

Benin issues its last postage stamps. [700.908]

The United Kingdom issues last postage stamps for use on Turks Islands. [285.738]

Nandgaon State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.941]

Bundi State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.930]

Jammu and Kashmir State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.939]

Charkhari State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.931]

Portugal issues first postage stamps for use in the Portuguese East Africa Colony of Zambezia, depicting King Carlos. [285.1165]

The United Kingdom issues first non-overprinted postage stamps for use in Zululand. [285.1191]

France issues first and only postage stamps for use in Sainte-Marie de Madagascar. [278.818]

France issues first and last non-overprint postage stamps for use in Nossi-Be. [1367.1556]

France issues last postage stamps for use in Obock. [1367.1560]

France issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in French Sudan. [1843.1355]

France issues last postage stamps for use in Diego-Suarez. [1843.807]

July 1

Bureau of Engraving and Pringing begins producing all US postage stamps. [1135] [1211.592]

August 5

Portugal issues first postage stamps for use in Portuguese Congo. [278.445] [1135]

August 6

Chinkiang, China issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

October 30

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Jammu and Kashmir State of India. [1841.938]

November

Zambesia issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

December 1

Ichang, China issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

December 31

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Bamra State of India. [1841.927]

1895

January

First postage stamps are issued for use in Ethiopia, depicting King Menelik II. [1843.1053]

February 28

Majunga town of Madagascar issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

March 20

Uganda issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

June 8

Amoy, China issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

June 20

Indian feudatory state Bussahir issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

(month unknown)

British Central Africa issues its first postage stamps. [700.1126]

First postage stamps are issued for use in Lourenco Marques. [1367.579]

Sungei Ujong issues its last postage stamps. [1367.705]

Bussahir State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.931]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in Zanzibar, overprints of India stamps. [285.1181]

July 1

Portugal issues first postage stamps for use in Inhambane, overprints on Mozambique stamps. [1135] [1841.992]

July

Brunei issues its first postage stamps, for local use, denominations 1/2 cent through one dollar. [1135]

August 1

Foochow Local Post in China issues its first postage stamps, denominations 1/2 cent through 40 cent, depicting a dragonboat. [1135]

December 31

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Nowanuggur State of India. [1841.941]

1896

January 1

First philatelic daily newspaper debuts, The Daily Stamp Item, published by Charles H. Mekeel of Saint Louis, Missouri. (It runs for 284 issues.) [971.292]

(month unknown)

The United Kingdom issues last postage stamps for Tobago. [285.505]

The United Kingdom issues last postage stamps for use in Zululand. [285.1191]

Colombia issues its last postage stamps for use in Panama. [278.62]

Last postage stamps are issued for use in Shanghai. [278.1100]

September 20

Nanking Local Post issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

Zanzibar issues its first non-overprint postage stamps. [285.1181]

October

Saint Helena joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

1897

January 2

Chinese Government Post issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

March 1

First postage stamps are issued for use in Sudan, overprints of Egypt stamps. [285.219] [1135]

March 17

Australiasian New Hebrides Company Limited issues its first postage stamps, denominated 1 and 2 pence, for use between New Hebrides and Sydney. [1135]

April 1

The first postage stamps for Cameroun under German dominion are issued, using overprinted stamps of Germany. [707.27] [1135]

June 22

New South Wales issues the world's first semi-postal stamps, with 1-shilling denomination but 1-pence for postage, the remainder to fund a home for consumptives. [1135]

Sarawak joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

(month unknown)

British Bechuanaland issues its last postage stamps. [700.795]

Germany issues first postage stamps for use in Togo, overprinted stamps of Germany. [285.506]

Dhar State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.934]

First postage stamps for German New Guinea are issued, overprints of German stamps. [1841.84]

First postage stamps for German South West Africa are issued, overprints of German stamps. [1841.84]

Las Bela State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.941]

First postage stamps are issued for Grand Comoros. [1841.303]

France issues first postage stamps for use in Senegal, using overprints of French Colonies. [278.1045]

Germany issues first postage stamps for use in the Marshall Islands, using overprints of Germany stamps. [1367.827]

1898

March 1

Sudan issues its first non-overprint postage stamps, eight values from 1-millieme to 10-piastres. [285.219] [681.49] [1135]

April 1

Portugal issues first and only postage stamps for use in Portuguese Africa. [278.445] [700.722]

June 30

Zululand ceases use of its stamps, replaced by those of Natal. [285.1191] [1135]

(month unknown)

British East Africa Protectorate issues its last postage stamps. [700.1127]

Great Britain issues first postage stamps for use on its administrative district of Crete. [707.574]

The USA begins issuing postage stamps for use in Cuba. [707.601]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in Uganda Protectorate, depicting Queen Victoria. [285.760]

Spain issues its last postage stamps for Puerto Rico. [278.456]

The United Kingdom issues last postage stamps for use in the Niger Coast Protectorate. [1367.1482]

The Nyassa Company issues first postage stamps for use in Nyassa, using overprints of Mozambique. [1367.1558]

Cuba issues its first postage stamps under US control. [700.193]

October 1

Gibraltar issues postage stamps denominated in pound sterling currency. [1135]

November 25

First postage stamps for use in Crete, issued under British administration. [707.574] [1135]

December 25

The British Post Office introduces Imperial Penny Postage, 1 pence postage per half ounce to most parts of the British Empire. [729.38]

1899

March 15

Department of Posts for Puerto Rico comes into existence, and places on sale in San Juan, Puerto Rico, American postage stamps overprinted "Porto Rico". [700.204] [1020.843] [1135]

May

Postage stamps for use in Crete are issued under Russian administration. [1135]

June 30

The USA issues overprinted US postage stamps for use in the Philippines. [700.198] [1135]

(month unknown)

Cuba issues its last postage stamps under US control. [700.193]

Hawaii issues its last postage stamps. [700.197]

Germany issues first stamps for the Caroline Islands, German stamps of denomination 3- to 50-pfennig stamps of Germany overprinted "Karolina". [1255.733]

Great Britain issues its last postage stamps for use on its administrative district of Crete. [707.574]

Russia issues postage stamps for use on its administrative district of Crete. [707.574]

Kishangarh State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.940]

Sirmoor State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.943]

The USA issues its first postage stamps for use in the Philippines, overprints of USA stamps. [278.238]

The USA issues its first postage stamps for use in Puerto Rico, overprints of USA stamps. [278.456]

France issues first postage stamps for use in Dahomey. [1843.763]

July 7

The USA issues overprinted US postage stamps for use in Guam. [700.196] [1135]

September

Spain issues first and last postage stamps for use in the Mariana Islands, using overprints of Philippines stamps. [1135] [1367.826]

1900

January 1

Korea joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

March 1

Germany issues first postage stamps for use in Samoa. [278.967] [1135]

Crete issues its own first postage stamps. [707.574] [1135]

March

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in Northern Nigeria, depicting Queen Victoria. [1135] [1367.1526]

April 16

US Post Office issues first books of postage stamps. [1]

April 17

British Post Office switches the half-pence Jubilee stamp from vermilion to green, first British stamp conforming to the UPU color convention. [729.38]

May

Germany issues its first postage stamps for use in the Mariana Islands, using overprints of Germany stamps. [1135] [1367.826]

June 14

Postage stamps of the USA replace Hawaiian stamps. [1135]

June 18

Transvaal issues postage stamps under British occupation. [1135]

(month unknown)

Puerto Rico issues its last postage stamps. [700.204]

First postage stamps of Cameroun under German dominion are issued. [707.27]

First postage stamps for Caroline Islands are issued, on stamps of Germany overprinted "Karolinen". [707.129]

First postage stamps for Kiauchau are issues, on stamps of Germany, Offices in China. [1367.170]

First stamps of the Federated Malay States are issued. [1367.692]

Germany issues first non-overprinted postage stamps for use in Togo. [285.506]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in Turks and Caicos. [285.718]

Bussahir State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.931]

First named postage stamps are issued for German East Africa. [1841.83]

First named postage stamps are issued for German South West Africa. [1841.84]

Wurttemberg issues its last regular use postage stamps. [1841.92]

Last postage stamps for use in Faridkot State of India are issued. [1841.921]

The USA issues its last postage stamps for use in Puerto Rico (replaced by USA stamps). [278.456]

July 16

Postage stamps of Straits Settlements are authorized for use in Federated Malay States during a shortage. [1135]

August 10

United Kingdom issues first Orange River Colony postage stamps, using overprints of Cape of Good Hope. [1135] [1367.1573]

October 30

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Jhalawar State of India. [1841.939]

November

Cayman Islands issues its first postage stamps. [707.130] [1135]

1901

January

Caroline Islands issues its first postage stamps. [707.129]

First postage stamps made specifically for Kiauchau are issued. [1367.170]

Germany issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in the Mariana Islands. [1367.826]

January 22

After 63 years England stops sale of Queen Victoria postage stamps series and begins King Edward VII series. [1]

March

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in Southern Nigeria, depicting Queen Victoria. [285.75] [1135]

March 30

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Bussahir State of India. [1841.931]

Last day of validity of postage stamps of Sirmoor State of India. [1841.943]

(month unknown)

Congo issues its last postage stamps. [700.811]

Germany issues the first Caroline Islands-specific postage stamps, 3-80pf values. [1255.734]

First named postage stamps are issued for German New Guinea. [1841.84]

Alwar State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.927]

Bhor State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.929]

The Nyassa Company issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in Nyassa. [1367.1558]

Germany issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in the Marshall Islands. [1367.827]

July 1

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in British New Guinea, eight denominations depicting a Lakatoi boat. [278.94] [1135]

1902

January 4

New Zealand issues first postage stamps for use in Niue, using overprints of New Zealand stamps. [1135] [1367.1494]

March 31

Wurttemberg gives up its postal autonomy. [1841.92]

April 2

WÃ¼rttemberg gives up postal independence. [1138.901]

May 5

First postage stamps are issued for Penrhyn Island, overprints of New Zealand stamps. [278.175] [1135]

June 16

US Senators receive from French engineer Phillippe Bunau-Varilla a 1902 2-cent postage stamp of Nicaragua depicting the March 24 volcano eruption, with an argument that Nicaragua was unstable geological terrain, unsuitable for a canal. (the subsequent vote is 42-34 in favor of the Panama route.) [1119.111]

(month unknown)

Spain issues first postage stamps for use in Spanish Guinea, depicting King Alfonso XIII. [285.173]

July

French Somali Coast issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

September 30

Cuba issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

October 4

Cuba joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

1903

January 1

Portugal issues first non-overprint postage stamps for use in Inhambane. [1841.992]

February 3

United Kingdom issues first non-overprint Orange River Colony postage stamps, depicting King Edward VII. [730.47] [1367.1573]

June 1

British Somaliland joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for British Somaliland, overprints on India stamps. [285.32] [1135]

June 12

New Zealand issues first postage stamps for Aitutaki, overprinted on stamps of New Zealand. [700.284] [1135]

(month unknown)

Antigua resumes issuing its own postage stamps. [700.426]

Korea issues its last stamps as Japan takes over its postal administration (and annexes the country in 1910). [1367.179]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in Saint Kitts-Nevis. [278.797]

France issues first and only postage stamps for use in Senegambia and Niger. [278.1075]

France issues last postage stamps for use in French Congo. [1843.1292]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for use in East Africa and Uganda Protectorates, depicting King Edward VII. [1843.903]

Spain issues first postage stamps for use in Elobey, Annobon, and Corisco, depicting King Alfonso XIII. [1843.1025]

July

Senegambia and Niger issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

October 12

Italy issues first postage stamps for use in Benadir, depicting a lion or an elephant. Benadir is a colony of Italy on the east coast of Africa. [285.15]

October

Italian Somaliland issues its first postage stamps. [1135]

November 16

The independent Republic of Panama issues first postage stamps, overprints of previous Panama stamps. [278.62] [1135]

1904

June 11

Panama joins the Universal Postal Union. [1135]

(month unknown)

The first postage stamps for Canal Zone under USA control are issued, using overprinted stamps of Panama. [700.188]

Cape of Good Hope issues its last postage stamps. [707.117]

The United Kingdom issues first postage stamps for Somaliland Protectorate. [285.32]

First named postage stamps are issued for Gabon. [1841.1]

Jaipur State of India issues its first postage stamps. [1841.937]

Las Bela State of India issues its last postage stamps. [1841.941]
